attributes.action: make good on the assurance that the ID card scheme is now voluntary by removing all plans for automatic enrollment based on application for essential documents such as drivers' licences and passports
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is disingenuous to claim that the scheme is voluntary so long as passports and other items are assigned 'designated document' status. To claim that you can opt out of this scheme only so long as you do not drive or ever leave the country is no kind of choice at all.
